description:
Joker and Hachi sneak on board Mr. Kaneari`s private Golden Express, a non-stop special express meant to transport a historical family treasure to the Kaneari Museum in Paris. Joker and Hachi sneak into the train from the roof, then infiltrate the sleeper car in disguise, but they end up trapped by iron bars in one car. Joker makes it out of the trap and tries to swipe the car itself by detaching it at the switchover point, but...
Source: crunchyroll
